import React, { useEffect, useContext, useMemo, useState } from "react"; import EnterMail from "./EnterMail.Component"; import EnterOtp from "./EnterOtp.Component"; import LoadingPage from "../LoadingPage.Component"; import { LogUpContext } from "../../contexts/LogUp.Context"; import clsx from "clsx"; import bannerForm from "../../assets/images/banners/bannerForm.png"; import fbIcon from "../../assets/icons/fb.png"; import ggIcon from "../../assets/icons/gg.png"; export default function LogUp({ statusLogUp, sendOtp, checkOtp }) { const logUpContext = useContext(LogUpContext); const [fullName, setFullName] = useState(); const [checkFillFullName, setCheckFillFullName] = useState(); const [checkSpecialInFullName, setCheckSpecialInFullName] = useState(); const [pass, setPass] = useState(); const [checkPass, setCheckPass] = useState(); const [checkFillPass, setCheckFillPass] = useState(); const [rePass, setRePass] = useState(); const [checkFillRepass, setCheckFillRepass] = useState(); const [checkRePass, setCheckRePass] = useState(); const [coincidePass, setCoinControlPass] = useState(); const checkSpecialChar = (text) => { var format = /[!@#$%^&*()_+\-=\[\]{};':"\\|,.<>\/?]+/; if (format.test(text)) { // console.log(true); return true; } else { // console.log(false); return false; } }; const checkPassCoinCide = () => { if (pass !== rePass) { setCoinControlPass(false); } else { setCoinControlPass(true); } }; //check special char in form useEffect(() => { if (checkSpecialChar(fullName)) { setCheckSpecialInFullName(true); } }); return (
